jobs.title: Full-Stack Developer + Systems Manager
descriptions: Designed and implemented a centralized email template management system using Python Django, optimizing the creation, updating, and deployment of over 40 email templates, resulting in increased productivity and consistency in client communication materials
Developing application to streamline roof data collection and automate inspection report generation, to reduce previous process duration by 75%
Manage CRM implementation, configuring automations, and providing continuous support, leading to streamlined data management and improved operational efficiency

Created customized training materials (including slideshows and activity diagrams) for various employee position groups, ensuring smooth onboarding and skill development while actively contributing to CRM troubleshooting and maintenance
Designed and launched company website while implementing a review campaign that substantially elevated the companies online reputation, boosting reviews from 3 to over 30

jobs.title: Team Lead, On-Campus Internship Team
descriptions: Led OCI team in planning, creation, and delivery of 2 inspirational/promotional videos, 2 sharable business models, and a redesign of the PCVF website
Conducted weekly team meetings, ensuring alignment on project objectives.  Proactively followed up with team members and promoted collaborative atmosphere through engaging team-building exercises
Coordinated expectations, progress, and implementation with PCVF management

descriptions: Trained two new missionaries, including mentorship in: instruction in mission protocol, effective teaching and proselyting, and accountable goal setting
Improved statistic success by 250% while leading assigned area over 7 months through effective coordination with regional leadership, leading mission wide statistics
